00038 
00039 #include "contiki-esb.h"
00040 
00041 PROCESS(test_sender_process, "Test - Sender");
00042 AUTOSTART_PROCESSES(&test_sender_process);
00043 
00044 #define PORT 1234
00045 
00046 PROCESS_THREAD(test_sender_process, ev, data)
00047 {
00048   static struct etimer timer;
00049   static struct uip_udp_conn *conn;
00050 
00051   PROCESS_BEGIN();
00052 
00053   conn = udp_broadcast_new(UIP_HTONS(PORT), NULL);
00054   etimer_set(&timer, CLOCK_SECOND * 2);
00055 
00056   while(1) {
00057     PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT_UNTIL(ev == PROCESS_EVENT_TIMER);
00058     etimer_reset(&timer);
00059 
00060     /* Send packet */
00061     tcpip_poll_udp(conn);
00062     PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT_UNTIL(ev == tcpip_event && uip_poll());
00063     leds_invert(LEDS_YELLOW);
00064     uip_send("Hello world", sizeof("Hello world"));
00065   }
00066   PROCESS_END();
00067 }
00068 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
